code-point-at

ES2015 String#codePointAt() ponyfill

Install

$ npm install --save code-point-at

Usage

var codePointAt = require('code-point-at');

codePointAt('üê¥');
//=> 128052

codePointAt('abc', 2);
//=> 99

API

codePointAt(input, [position])
